thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 10 of 12
thread.title: Lucio Battisti

author: Lucio Battisti
title: Lucio Battisti
text: We purchased a refurbished unit from Whole Latte Love and had some issues with it. We contacted them with our concerns and they truly went above and beyond to rectify the situation. We are extremely happy with our Gaggia Titanium and we feel confident making future purchases with Whole Latte Love knowing that they are very attentive and stand behind both their products and service. Tracy was the customer service representative who assisted us and she made sure our product met every one of our expectations. She was extremely responsive and accommodating. What could have been a very negative experience was thoroughly addressed and they have truly earned our future business.
